name: Basic Citric Berry

name: Basic Cloth Footwraps
description: No description available

name: Basic Embergrain Seeds

name: Basic Fertilizer

name: Basic Firesand

name: Basic Fish Oil
description: Oil made from fish. Can be used for making leather treatment and ink.

name: Basic Flower

name: Basic Food Waste
description: Discarded scraps of food. Can be used to create fertilizer.

name: Basic Healing Potion
description: A potion made from Hexmoths. Increases one's ability to naturally recover from damages.

name: Basic Ink

name: Basic Leather Treatment

name: Basic Metal Solvent
description: A solvent used to purify metal further.

name: Basic Mortar

name: Basic Mushroom

name: Basic Pigment

name: Basic Potter's Mix

name: Basic Raw Meat

name: Basic Sand

name: Basic Stamina Potion

name: Basic Starbulb

name: Basic Starbulb Seeds

name: Basic Tannin

name: Basic Wispweave Seeds

name: Basic Wood Polish
